name: Sub Sonar (ExilonWasTaken)
description:
You're in a submarine in pitch black water. Find your objectives and get out.

Made for the Brackeys 2022.2 game jam.

Tips:

1. Avoid walls, you can hear them.

2. Patience helps.

3. Look around for objectives, your sonar will find them.

4. Your sonar is loud, don't let it hear you.

5. It will lose interest. If you know its near, hold still and don't make noise.
